original: intros m z t H1 H2 H3 p. unfold expo1, ex_j. split. - intros [H4 [j [H5 H6]]]. split. + apply H4. + destruct (le_lt_dec j p) as [H7 | H7]. * left. apply H7. * right. apply H7. + apply H6. - intros [H4 [H5 | [j [H6 H7]]]]. + split. * apply H4. * exists (p - 1)%nat. split. -- rewrite <- H5. apply Nat.sub_1_r. -- apply H5. + split. * apply H4. * exists j. split. -- apply H6. -- apply H7.
